question_text.en: Are you an athlete, coach or referee?
question_text.zh: 你的職業是運動員，教練，或者裁判嗎？

question_text.en: Have you placed top 3 at the Olympics or first in the Asian Games or a World Championship?
question_text.zh: Have you placed top 3 at the Olympics or first in the Asian Games or a World Championship?

question_text.en: Have you been a national team coach, or had someone you coached achieve top 3 at the Olympics or first in the Asian Games or a World Championship?
question_text.zh: Have you been a national team coach, or had someone you coached achieve top 3 at the Olympics or first in the Asian Games or a World Championship?

question_text.en: Did you referee a match at the Olympics, Asian Games or equivalent?
question_text.zh: Did you referee a match at the Olympics, Asian Games or equivalent?

question_text.en: Are you a lawyer?
question_text.zh: 你是律師嗎?

question_text.en: Was your most recent monthly salary >160k TWD?
question_text.zh: Was your most recent monthly salary >160k TWD?

question_text.en: Are you an architect?
question_text.zh: Are you an architect?

question_text.en: Do you have an architect license, or at least five years of design or contructions experience working at a firm AND a position with most recent monthly salary of at least 160k NT?
question_text.zh: Do you have an architect license, or at least five years of design or contructions experience working at a firm AND a position with most recent monthly salary of at least 160k NT?

question_text.en: Are you an Executive or GM?
question_text.zh: Are you an Executive or GM?

question_text.en: Do you run a financial firm?
question_text.zh: Do you run a financial firm?

question_text.en: Do you run the Taiwan R&D centre, Taiwan branch office or HQ of a multinational?
question_text.zh: Do you run the Taiwan R&D centre, Taiwan branch office or HQ of a multinational?

question_text.en: Have you run a film, broadcast, or pop music organisation for at least 5 years?
question_text.zh: Have you run a film, broadcast, or pop music organisation for at least 5 years?

question_text.en: Do you work in the Finance industry?
question_text.zh: Do you work in the Finance industry?

question_text.en: Are you a  CFA,CFP, FRM, CIIA, CIA, PRM, FSA, FCAS, FIA, FIAA, SEI-KAIIN etc?
question_text.zh: Are you a  CFA,CFP, FRM, CIIA, CIA, PRM, FSA, FCAS, FIA, FIAA, SEI-KAIIN etc?

question_text.en: Will the Taiwan FSC, and a banking, insurance or finance association recommend you?
question_text.zh: Will the Taiwan FSC, and a banking, insurance or finance association recommend you?

question_text.en: Will you make significant other contributions to the finance industry?
question_text.zh: Will you make significant other contributions to the finance industry?

question_text.en: Do you have 5 years experience in FinTech, or finance related to another innovative field?
question_text.zh: Do you have 5 years experience in FinTech, or finance related to another innovative field?

question_text.en: Do you have a PhD?
question_text.zh: 你有博士學位嗎？

question_text.en: Is it from a "top 200" university?
question_text.zh: Is it from a "top 200" university?

question_text.en: Is it in science and technology? Have you worked in the field for more than 4 years?
question_text.zh: Is it in science and technology? Have you worked in the field for more than 4 years?

question_text.en: Is your field unique science and technology field and lacking in Taiwan?
question_text.zh: Is your field unique science and technology field and lacking in Taiwan?

question_text.en: Have you won an international award, worked in your field for more than 4 years and filed a published a patent or journal paper?
question_text.zh: Have you won an international award, worked in your field for more than 4 years and filed a published a patent or journal paper?

question_text.en: Is your PhD related to the publishing industry and you have received an important international award?
question_text.zh: Is your PhD related to the publishing industry and you have received an important international award?

question_text.en: Are you a teacher or researcher?
question_text.zh: Are you a teacher or researcher?

question_text.en: Have you worked as a teacher or researcher at a top 500 university during the past 5 years AND have at least 5 years experience?
question_text.zh: Have you worked as a teacher or researcher at a top 500 university during the past 5 years AND have at least 5 years experience?

question_text.en: Have you won a Yushan (young) scholar award?
question_text.zh: Have you won a Yushan (young) scholar award?

question_text.en: Do you hold an important art research position?
question_text.zh: Do you hold an important art research position?

question_text.en: Are you a professor of publishing or mass communication?
question_text.zh: Are you a professor of publishing or mass communication?

question_text.en: Do you work in science or technology?
question_text.zh: Do you work in science or technology?

question_text.en: Do you have a Nobel prize or other international award?
question_text.zh: Do you have a Nobel prize or other international award?

question_text.en: Do you hold the highest academic title possible in your country, at your national academy of sciences or equivalent?
question_text.zh: Do you hold the highest academic title possible in your country, at your national academy of sciences or equivalent?

question_text.en: Are you a researcher with significant notable publishing history lasting over the past 3 years?
question_text.zh: Are you a researcher with significant notable publishing history lasting over the past 3 years?

question_text.en: Are you exceptional at AI, IoT, AU, Blockchain, VR, robots or 3D printing?
question_text.zh: Are you exceptional at AI, IoT, AU, Blockchain, VR, robots or 3D printing?

question_text.en: Are you exceptional at software, electronics, material science, sensing, biotech, green tech, frontier research or military tech?
question_text.zh: Are you exceptional at software, electronics, material science, sensing, biotech, green tech, frontier research or military tech?

question_text.en: Is your field particularly niche and lacking in Taiwan?
question_text.zh: Is your field particularly niche and lacking in Taiwan?

question_text.en: Was your most recent monthly salary  >160k TWD?
question_text.zh: Was your most recent monthly salary  >160k TWD?

question_text.en: Do you have more than 5 years of teaching experience?
question_text.zh: Do you have more than 5 years of teaching experience?

question_text.en: Do you work in the Finance industry?
question_text.zh: Do you work in the Finance industry?

question_text.en: Do you work in science and technology?
question_text.zh: Do you work in science and technology?

question_text.en: Do you hold an important position in an international organisation or government?
question_text.zh: Do you hold an important position in an international organisation or government?

question_text.en: Are you an artist, publisher/editor or arts administrator ?
question_text.zh: Are you an artist, publisher/editor or arts administrator ?

question_text.en: Were you significant in hosting a major international event?
question_text.zh: Were you significant in hosting a major international event?

question_text.en: Have you received a major national or international award, or judged a major award?
question_text.zh: Have you received a major national or international award, or judged a major award?

question_text.en: Are you the editor/publisher/manager of a major publication, or a copywriter, with at least 10 years experience
question_text.zh: Are you the editor/publisher/manager of a major publication, or a copywriter, with at least 10 years experience

question_text.en: Do you have >5 years work experience and have made special contributions to film, broadcast or pop music?
question_text.zh: Do you have >5 years work experience and have made special contributions to film, broadcast or pop music?

question_text.en: Are you a nationally/internationally recognised preserver of handicraft technique?
question_text.zh: Are you a nationally/internationally recognised preserver of handicraft technique?

question_text.en: Have you previously served in an international NGO?
question_text.zh: Have you previously served in an international NGO?

question_text.en: Will the Ministry of Culture validate your skills as an artist, publisher or administrator?
question_text.zh: Will the Ministry of Culture validate your skills as an artist, publisher or administrator?

question_text.en: Do you have >8 years of  experience?
question_text.zh: Do you have >8 years of  experience?

question_text.en: Is your experience in semiconductor, electronics, IT, biotech, machinery, transportation, green energy, or consulting?
question_text.zh: Is your experience in semiconductor, electronics, IT, biotech, machinery, transportation, green energy, or consulting?

question_text.en: Are your skills otherwise in demand in Taiwan?
question_text.zh: Are your skills otherwise in demand in Taiwan?

question_text.en: Was your most recent monthly salary  >160k TWD?
question_text.zh: Was your most recent monthly salary  >160k TWD?

question_text.en: Are you currently a university professor or research fellow?
question_text.zh: Are you currently a university professor or research fellow?

question_text.en: Are you an executive at a law firm or hold a law-related executive position at a corporation?
question_text.zh: Are you an executive at a law firm or hold a law-related executive position at a corporation?

question_text.en: Will the Bar Association recommend you?
question_text.zh: Will the Bar Association recommend you?
